text:
The class org.apache.log4j.config.PropertySetterException should be in the 
Log4j-Core.jar but it is not.  I fixed this by inserting:

${stem}/config/PropertySetterException.class

to line 167 of build.xml
creator: dsmiley@mitre.org

text:
David,

If I am not mistaken, this was fixed in the official log4j 1.1 release. Why are 
you still using a beta version? Ceki
creator: cgu@qos.ch
